patthana12.16:1.1: Nasaraṇaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.16:2.1: Nasaraṇaṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha ekaṁ. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.16:3.1: Nasaraṇaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana12.16:4.1: Nasaraṇaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.16:5.1: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana12.16:6.1: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha ekaṁ. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.16:7.1: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.16:8.1: Nasaraṇaṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha ekaṁ. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.16:9.1: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha ekaṁ. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.16:10.1: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana12.16:11.1: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
